SRP.A: On Crimson Peaks, the data point in 1971 is {below} and to the {left} of the data point in 1975.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Golden Delta. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(3 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1971, 1975, 1979}.
